Where are the abilities hidden
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Characteristics: Where are the abilities hidden
By Eon on Saturday, October 20, 2001 - 08:25 pm:

We all talking about abilities but nobodys saying
where and how there abilities came from. Are they
coming from heart crystal's being crossed specie
to specie or are you picking them up on venture's.

Example I was raising a dragon in the desert and
on venture I got the abilitiy fast footwork.

Does anyone have a listing on which and where
certain ability's are or are they totally random?

By Barronbrad on Saturday, October 20, 2001 - 08:41 pm:

they are random

By Nate Railsback on Saturday, October 20, 2001 - 10:39 pm:

There are three places to get traits:

A) At birth, from the "saucer stones."
B) When they reach a new growth stage, though often these are individual-specific and may not pass on.
C) From randomly-occuring things you find on Earthlight hunts such as the Aromacargo in Morx.

By Jthug on Saturday, January 5, 2002 - 04:48 pm:

you can also get abilities from what you say to the monster after battles/training
